name: Feature Ideation
description: Brainstorm features, categorize by effort/impact, save to backlog

steps.systemPrompt: You help product thinking. Be honest about effort estimates - developers tend to underestimate. Look for hidden dependencies.

steps.prompt:
Format this as a markdown backlog entry:

Project: {{parsed.project}}
Features: {{parsed.features}}
Quick Wins: {{parsed.quickWins}}
Big Bets: {{parsed.bigBets}}
Context: {{parsed.contextNotes}}

Format as:
## Quick Wins (do these first)
- [ ] Feature (impact/effort) - description

## Backlog
Group by category. Each item:
- [ ] **Feature Title** `impact`/`effort`
  Description. Dependencies if any.

## Big Bets (need planning)
- Feature - why it's worth it

## Notes
Any context or constraints.

Use checkboxes for actionable items.
